input: Sergey appreciated intricate designs and decided to keep the painting instead of the sculpture because the _ was interesting.

The ring was stuck on the woman's finger while the bracelet slipped off her wrist because the _ was too loose.
His reasons helped me understand the tasks a lot better than before, because the _ were clear.
Sam was not able to use the humidifier and instead used nasal spray to soothe his nose congestion, because the _ was clean.
Amy was more of a reader and Angela was more of a watcher, so _ tended to choose books.
Jim bought a revolver and tried to practice his shooting at the shooting range but the _ was too hard.

Rebecca is good with numbers, Laura is not so _ didn't choose a career in accounting.
Cynthia made a 4 batches of cupcakes and asked Sarah to help with the decorating them because _ frequently decorated cupcakes before.
Wanting a new shed Aaron hired Derrick to build them one, _ will build a new shed.
Craig went shopping at an expensive food store while Kevin went to the food kitchen since _ was rich.
